item.title: Broadcast on 25-Nov-2014
item.description: listen to a bunch of electronic/synthesizer-using bands and musicians, including tv on the radio, hundred waters, and anna lunoe

item.title: Broadcast on 18-Nov-2014
item.description: listen to bands from every province across the great white north. bcasa, the weakerthans, fever feel, dead soft and more, eh
item.itunes:subtitle: ooooo canada

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Nov-2014
item.description: All of my favourite Vancouver musicians! Listen to Dead Ghosts, Mac Demarco, Mode Moderne and more. Plus musical guests and Shindig contestants Two Doges and a Couple of Bauds
item.itunes:subtitle: no fun city

item.description: shindig 2014 bands who have already performed and going to be performing in coming weeks. sam tudor, alea rae, the vaporettos and more

item.description: SUB POP bands. Mudhoney, Sleater Kinney, Dum Dum Girls and more!

item.title: Broadcast on 29-Apr-2014
item.description: This is the final segment of Shine On for the school year - will return in Sept! The theme this week was bands who will be at music festivals this summer. I highlighted some bands playing at Sasquatch!, Squamish, Bonnaroo, and Lollapalooza. Outkast, Jack White, John Butler Trio, Flume, Broken Bells, Warpaint and MANY OTHERS! Have a rockin' summer!
item.itunes:subtitle: summer lovin'

item.title: Broadcast on 22-Apr-2014
item.description: the theme this week is albums of 2014! lots of great indie rock bands with awesome new albums. listen and hear some super new tunes!
item.itunes:subtitle: shine on

item.title: Broadcast on 15-Apr-2014
item.description: it's exam time so the theme this week is mellow studying tunes! very relaxed, lots of local bands as well as US and canadian bands. good luck on the exams everyone!
item.itunes:subtitle: shine on

item.title: Broadcast on 08-Apr-2014
item.description: the theme of the week is unsigned - completely independent artists! lots of bands out of vancouver and southern ontario.
item.itunes:subtitle: shine on

item.title: Broadcast on 01-Apr-2014
item.description: the theme this week was Dope Duos - my favourite musical duos from across canada and the u.s.!
item.itunes:subtitle: shine on

item.title: Broadcast on 25-Mar-2014
item.description: the theme this week is 'west coast best coast' playing all west coast music - lots from vancouver and l.a. also mr. jed weiss is featured on the show!
item.itunes:subtitle: shine on

item.title: Broadcast on 11-Mar-2014
item.description: This week's theme is the Fundrive Hangover - local bands that played in the rock n' roll lottery at the Biltmore last Friday
